name: MARLEY SIMONE
overview:
FASHION BEYOND THE PERIMETERS OF AVERAGE MARLEY SIMONE A Premier Fashion Styling Firm MARLEY SIMONE is a premier fashion styling firm that offers a full range of services to empower you with tools to make you feel and look fantastic. We work closely with clients to create looks to fit everyday lifestyle as well as creating looks for special events and occasions. Personal Stylist ~ Wardrobe Stylist ~ Consultation ~ Personal Shopping ~ Group Parties
